aux - Static variable in class it.unimol.monopoly.app.Player
Counter variable of support to both this and other classes, used to dynamically increment the IDs of each player the moment they are created, starting from 0, and manage them at best in collaboration with other classes, avoiding possible exceptions or unexpected events during the game.
